lines.text: name = string array of size number
for i = 0 to number exclusive , read name [ i ]
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < number ; i ++ ) { cin >> name [ i ] ; }
for ( int i = 0 ; i < number ; i ++ )

lines.text: num = integer with num = name [ i ] . size ( ) - 2
print name [ i ] [ 0 ] , num , name [ i ] [ name [ i ] . size ( ) - 1 ]
lines.code: cout << name [ i ] [ 0 ] << num << name [ i ] [ name [ i ] . size ( ) - 1 ] << endl ;
